title: Patch Notes
content: during the first night at the camp overlooking Wyrm's Crossing.Fixed one of Gortash's Speak with Dead lines getting cut off prematurely. Fixed Mizora snapping her head around like a bobblehead if you reject her when she's enticing you with the pleasures of the Hells. Fixed Shadowheart popping out of place in the dialogue with Nocturne. Fixed jittery mocap for the Inquirer of Grief (before her reveal).
